maqras.text: geudeul-eun gippeohalini hananim ui eunchong-gwa jabiga geugeos-iloda ha nanim-eun midneun jadeul-ui bosang-eul saggam chi anh-eusinila
geudeul-i busang-eul ib-eun huelato hananimgwa seonjijaui buleum-e eung hayeo jeong-uileul silcheonhago saag-eul meol li handamyeon keunakeun bosang-eul bad-euli la

muliga geudeul-ege malhagil manh-eun gunjung-i neohuiege daehanghayeo o nani geudeul-eul dulyeowo hala geuleoni geudeul-ui sin-ang-eun deoug duteowojyeoss-euni geudeul-i malhadeola ulineun hananimman eulo manjoghanani seunglineun geubun-e ge-uitaghaneun ja-ege issnola

geulihayeo geudeul-eun hananim-ui jabiwa eunchong-eul ibgo dol-awass-eumyeo geudeul-eul haechineun geos eobs-eoss-euni ineun geudeul-i hananim-eul chujonghaessgi ttaemun-i la hananim-eun muhanhan eunchong-eulo chung manhasim-ila
geudeul mulileul dulyeobgehaneun geos-eun ojig satan-il ppun-ila geudeul-eul dulyeowohaji malmyeo midneun jalamyeon na man-eul dulyeowohala

mid-eum-eul swibsali jeobeolineun jadeul-i geudaeleul seulpeuge haji aniha myeo geudeul-eun hananim-eul jogeumdo jeohae hal su eobsnola hananim-eun naeseeseo geudeul-ege amuleon yangsigdo juji a nihasimyeo geudeul-egeneun gahoghan jaeang man iss-eul ttaleum-ila
mid-eum-eul beoligo bulsin-eul taeghaneun jadeul-i issnani ideul ttohan hana nim-eul jogeumdo jeohaehal su eobs-eumyeo ha nanim-eun geudeul-ege gotongseuleoun jaeang eul gajyeoda julila

hananim-i bulsinjadeulgwa jamsi meomulleo iss-eum-i geudeul-ege gilbolago saeng-gagchi anhge halila sillo geubun-i geudeulgwa jamsi chelyuham-eun joeag-eul jeung gasikyeo geudeul-ege jaeang-i issge hal ttaleum-ila

hananim-eun midneun jadeul-i cheohago issneun sangtaelo beolyeoduji aniha simyeo saag-eulobuteo gubyeolhago gilbo lo indohasa boiji anihan yeong-gye neun balghiji anh-eusinila geuleona ha nanim-eun geubun-ui tteus-e ttalo seonjija deul-eul seontaeghasyeoss-euni hananimgwa seonjijadeul-eul mid-eula midneundamyeon gong-gyeonghalageulihamyeon neohuiege keunakeun bosang-iiss-eul geos-ila

hananim-i bepul-eo geudeul-i chugjeoghan jaemul-eul sayonghaneunde insaeghaehaneun geos-i geudeul-ege deo joh-eulji moleuna ohilyeo geu insaegham-i geudeul-e ge deoug saag halilaneun geos-eul saeng-gagke halila insaeghaessdeon geosdeul-i simpan ui nal geudeul-ui mog-eul joealidoda cheonjie nam-a issneun yusan-i hananim kke gwisogdoenani hananim-eun geudeul-i haenghaneun geosdeul-eul algo gyesinila

gungpibhana ulineun buyuhadoda lago malhaneun yudaeindeul-ui soli leul hananim-eun deul-eusyeossnani hananim-eungeudeul-i malhaneun geosgwa seonjijadeul-eul salhaehan joeag-eul giloghasimyeo galodoeigeulgeolineun yuhwangbul-eul masboljieoda
igeos-eun neohuideul-i jeojileun geos-ilodoe hananim-eun sillo geu jungbogdeul ege jeoldaelo budanghaji anh-eusinila

hananimkkeseo uliege myeongha yeo haneul-eseo bul-i naelyeowa samkyeobeo lin jemul-eul uliege gajyeoeul ttaekka ji seonjijaleul midjimalla malhaneun ja issnani illeogalodoe nae ijeon-e mal sseumgwa neohuiga yoguhan geosdeul-eul gaji go seonjijadeul-i osyeoss-eul ttae neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon wae geudeul-eul salhaehayeossneu nyo
man-il geudeul-i geudaeleul bu-inhandamyeon geu ijeon-ui malsseumgwa sipyeongwa gu yaggwa sin-yag-eul gajyeoon seonjijadeuldo bujeongdoenola

modeun ingan-eun jug-eum-eul masbomyeosimpan-ui nal bosang-eul badge doenila jiog-eulobuteo gujedoen ja-egeneun cheon gug-ui mun-i yeollil geos-imyeo geugos-eseo yeong-gwang-eul nulinola i sesang-eun danji giman-ui sogsee bulgwahanila
